code: import thunk from'redux-thunk';import userReducer from"./userReducer.js";import appReducer from"./appReducer.js";import AsyncStorage from'@react-native-async-storage/async-storage';import{persistStore,persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import{applyMiddleware,createStore,combineReducers}from'redux';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:AsyncStorage,whitelist:[]};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:persistReducer(persistConfig,userReducer),app:appReducer});export var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware(thunk));export var persistor=persistStore(store);
